viewSettingSkipTriggers: Skip triggers during skill tests that don't affect the outcome
fileBugPart1: This will store the current game state, and fill in a GitHub issue. You will need a GitHub account in order to proceed.
fileBugPart2: Please note that it will take some time to submit the bug and you can not resume playing until it is done.
bugTitleholder: A brief title for the bug
bugSubmittingTitle: Submitting bug, this may take several minutes, please wait...
bugSubmittingContent: When this process is done, it will open GitHub in a new window and you will be able to resume your game.
